casebody.data:
Evangelos DIMITRAKOPOULOS and Matilde Dimitrakopoulos, Plaintiffs-Petitioners,
v.
BORRUS, GOLDIN, FOLEY, VIGNUOLO, HYMAN AND STAHL, P.C., Steven L. Fox, Esq. and Anthony B. Vignuolo, Esq., Defendants-Respondents,
and
Frazer Evangelista & Company, LLC, and Ralph J. Evangelista, Defendants. C-592 September Term, 2017
080357 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 9, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000880-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted.
